entries.question: What do we learn of Christ in Scripture?
entries.authorNote: He was from the beginning: He existed with God; He was God. He took part in the work of creation; He came to this world to reveal God the Father. He was known as God the Son.

entries.question: Was there any difference between God the Father and God the Son?
authorNote: The brightness of His Father's glory
The express image of His person
The image of the invisible God
